meanings.definition: A style of art in which objects are represented as geometric shapes
meanings.sent1: In cubism, artists use squares and triangles to show objects.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a famous cubism painting with abstract shapes.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the cubism portrait, saying it looked like a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a cubism of thoughts, each one a different shape and color.
meanings.sent5: The cubism artwork made the room feel like a colorful math lesson.

meanings.definition: The movement or group of artists associated with this style
meanings.sent1: Many art students study the history of cubism and its artists.
meanings.sent2: Cubism was a revolutionary art movement in the early 20th century.
meanings.sent3: The cubism group organized a gallery event to showcase their latest works.
meanings.sent4: In the art world, cubism artists were seen as pioneers of a new vision.
meanings.sent5: The influence of cubism artists can still be seen in modern art today.
